TEXT.S:
Zambiakakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 24 bulad 10 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Edgar Lungu, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihcaan 1 bulad 25 demiad. u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Lusaka.
Zambiau Zambiasa i labu nu Fey-Cuo, itiza i 15 00 S, 30 00 E.u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 752,618 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 743,398 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 9,220 sq km.hamin nu tademaw sa 15,510,711. kakalukan umah sa 31.70%, kilakilangan umah sa 66.30%, zumaay henay umah sa 2%. Republic of Zambia20) Sam-piya kunhe-kuo (Republic of Zambia ), kitidaan i nuteban nu Africa, caay pililisay tu bayu a kanatal, ahebal nu lala' nuheni u Taywannu tusa a bataan a bay, ulabu nu talakaw nu buyu makaala tu cacay (1000) a malebut a kunce nu pina a talakawan nu buyu'.
tapang tusu nu kanatal) sakasilaculan nu ba'tu, cen-ce nuheni matatungus, naw Africanu sakatusa anikasi kalisiwan a kanatal, itini nu biyawan a Africanu kanatal sasiidaay atu misakapahay tu niyadu'an a satalakaway anikaudip, amica kuni kasapakuyuc nina kanatal, nika u miduducay tu sakay micunusay a sakakapah nu sakaudip a kanatal ayda.[1]
likisi151719) naayaw nu tusaay a malebut, Sam-piyaitiniay a tademaw sawni maala ku balucu nui putahay a tademaw atu nika sasungaay. sabaw tu lima (15) a seci, musakamuay tu pan-tua kamuwan nu tademaw milihidatu tu Sam-piya, namaka sabaw tu pitu (17) katukuh tu sabaw tu siwa (19) a seci u sayadahay numi cumuday. 19 sabaw tu siwa 19 a se-ci nu cuoye, O-cuomabulaway a tademaw atu dinduaya tademaw malingatu micumud tu niyadu'. 1888路 cacay a malebut walu a lasubu wlau a bataan idawku walu (1888) a mihcaan, Ing-kuo (United Kingdommabulaway ci Cecil John Rhodes (路) namakayda i tumuk nuheni maala tu spikudkud tu 'kim a kilian. nuyda a mihcaan Ing-kuo (United Kingdompatideng tu Nan-luode-siya (Timulay a Rhodesiaatu Pei-luode-siya (Amisay a Rhodesia. 19241953 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat (1924) a mihcaan , Pei-luode-siyamala Ing-kuonu mabulaway anikuwanan a dadiputan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku tulu (1953) a mihcaan, Nan-luode-siyaatu Niya-salanmapulung kuheni, misakaput tu Luode-siya atu Niya-salan lenpan. 1962 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku tusa (1962) a mihcaan pisingkiwan nu lenpan, Fa-cuoa tademaw mapadang nu katuuday a lipuingay a tademaw nu aenengan. kilul satu, mikaygi ku lipuin a tademaw mihang tunikagian , sakamusa tu Pei-luode-siya. pialesi han tu linpan han, miyukiw tu sakahebal nu cece'mincu cucun atu kunmincun. 196319641024 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku tulu (1963) a mihcaan, Cun-fa len-pantatenga mibulesak. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku sepat (1964) a mihcaan cacay a bataan a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat a demiad, Pei-luode-siyamiliyas tu Ing-kuo, sumad han ku ngangan tu Sam-piya-kunhe-kuo--)
mahka misiteked satu , mangelu' henay ku Sam-piya. tawya nu sepatay a biyawan nu kanatal- luode-siya, Nan-feaanikuwanan nu tu Sinan-faatu Pu-tawya (Portugalmabulaway a kitidaan a Putaw-ya ( Portugalnu Tun-feaatu Pu-tawya (Portugalnu tipanay a Africanu sanglacay namin kumi kuwanay tunu henian
Sam-piya (Zambiapacuked tu Fea-cuo (Africanu timulan a pina nu kanatal a lumeni'ay a tademawan nu masakaputay, sisa nina kanatal atu Luode-siya (Rhodesiaa kanki kabalihenawan sa, sadikuday nina tusaay a kanatalan caaytu kacumud.
nikudan satu, nipadang patidenga nu Chinatu TAZARA dadan nu silamalaymawada'tu ku saka tahekal nu kawa . u Zambezi sauwacsauwac a Kaze-pa nanum nu dingkiidaw kuni patudud tu tanengay a dingki
Sampi-ya (Zambiamikawaw tu mincu cence. paka icelang tu siakay a kawaw atu kasilaculan tu ba'tu ' nu sakasilaculan nu Sampu-ya (Zambianu sasihica nu Fea-cuoa niyadu'ay nu kahemekan a nipalekalan. 2006928102路150703626 tusa a malebut idaw ku enem (2006) a mihcaan siwa a baulad tusa a bataan idaw ku walu a demiad, pisinkiwan nu Cung-tun atu i-huy a demiad. cacay a bataan a bulad tusa a demiad, sakakaay a fuing mihapu tu sasakamuen, ci Li-wil. Muwaw-nawaw-sa (路) maala matulin cinida sa. nu katuuday a micudan makaalatu cacay a lasubu lima abataan nu tademaw dumasa idaw ku pitu a bataan nu a tademawan, nu aykuo a tademaw makaalatu tulu a bataan idaw ku enem a tademaw, nu tuni mincutan han idaw kuni kaalaan tu tusa a bataan idaw ku enem a tademawan.[2]
kakitidaan:- nina kakitidan lima ku tataydan, Ciatan-cia- talakway a buyubuyu'an, Tun-fei tabalikay a masatepaday, Kala-hali masabintangay a kakitidaan, Luan-kua-Mala-wey talakaway a buyu'buyu'an (-), masabitangay a kakitidaan nu Luan-kuwa sauwac. 153258 kacaledesan nanay a demiad nu Sampi-ya, talakaw ku buyu' masenged aca ku demiad, demiad nuheni mikibanihiuw tuduma a Fea-cuonu kanatal, diheku ku demiad, mihcaan mala tulu ku puu' nuheni, capiwac han sabaw tu lima katukuh tu talu a bataan idaw ku tusa a du', tu mihcaan nulalud ku kasidikucan nuheni, kasienawan nuheni sa limaay a bulad katukuh tu walu a bulad, masasu hicaay kiya ku demiad nuheni, macunus nu talakaw nu buyu' nuheni, itinisa a puu'an tu labii amicunus tu saka dihku nu dikuc.
Sampi-yaahebal ku lala adidi ku tademaw nuheni, pulung nu tademaw han nu mala tulu tu tusa nu Taywan, nika pankiw nu tademaw itida namin mueneng i tukay a kakitidaan, talakaw ku nikaudip nu tukayay a tademaw. u tun, kusa kiman a ba'ba'tuwan a nikatatungusan nu lacul, idaw ku tuna ba'tuan kasi nganganan nu kanatal.
macunus nuni kasidamekan, matatungus ku nanum , kapah aca ku aaidangan nuheni, u kitakit han tulu ku satabakiay nu cascas u Widu-liya (Victoria cascasa cascas ku katinengan nu katuuday a tademaw, anganganan nu kakawawen u tademaw u ba'ba'tuan, sakaliwmah, mipadangay a kawaw, u laliwkuwan atu sapicunus tu kalisiw a kawaw ku amelikay. 19;Safari32 saka si ngangay nu Widu-liya cascas, Sampi-yaidaw ku sabaw tu siwa a kanatal nu papahutinan tu aadupen nu kakitidaan, u Kafu-aya kanatal nu kakitadaan ku satabakiay a lala, pakunida hananay ku saka situngus anikasi laculan, u dayhiw nu aadihan, dumasatu u saka namuhan nu aadupen nuSafariaidangan idaw kunipi cunus tu tulu a bataan idaw ku tusa nu aadupan a kakitidaan.[3]
lalangawan2000: namaka tusa a malebut a mihcaan malingatu palekal tu aaidangan, nutaydaay amiliwkuay a tademaw macunus macunus ku taydaay amidang. aydatu nikataydaan a mihcaan tuni palekalan tu aaidangan han idaw ku: Kafu-ay kanatalay a aaidangan, Sam-pi-si sauwac, Kali-pa-banaw.
Sampi-ya (Zambiaa tademaw idaw ku Fai-cuoa binacadan nu kalimulak nu wayway naheni, palaw nuheni u sakaudip atu sakakapah tu cabay nu sasalamaan a wayway, manamuh namin ku tademaw tu dadadiwen, matineng mudadiw matineng mapalaw. Sampi-ya (Zambianu tukayan nipatideng tu kakaydaan a dadan ahebal, masilud bangcal kuni patideng tu luma, idaw kunama ka Ing-kuomabulaway nu waywayan.
inaka a kakitidaan u cenga kawala' ku luma, masa micidekay a silusian. tada u kakanen nu heni han u kupkup a walay, minfun, belac, atu canacanan nu lami' hecian.[4]
